column1: #Text=Meelo says : " I got ta go pee . "
#Text=There are children , and a baby here .
#Text=" Red Lotus sentry # 1 says : " Oh , so you just called me over to attack me ?
#Text=I do n't know how we ended up in daycare while everyone else gets to watch the Avatar being destroyed .
#Text=I can hold a bowl of poison !
#Text=" Suyin says : " Oh , honey , I 'm so glad you 're safe .
#Text=Just because I was blown out of the sky , and fell hundreds of feet down a cliff ?
#Text=Do n't you know it takes more than that to get rid of me ?
#Text=" Lin says : " We have to get these two out of here now .
#Text=" Bumi says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " You guys get everyone out of here .
#Text=" Mako says : " We 're going with you .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You do n't have to search for her .
#Text=I know exactly where she 's being held .
